Front-End Icon font

Created:2018-04-14  Last modified:2018-04-14

  • Introduction
  • Examples
  • Bootstrap Social Buttons

  1. Introduction

    Icon font is a special character that represents like figures

    Event thought it's like figure, its size and color can be adjusted just like a text.

    SVG->CSS

  2. Examples

    Font awesome provides a lot of free icon fonts, we can insert the icon font by inserting a i tag with css class.

    Install font awesome

    Not just a single .css file, font awesome also needs files that provides the source of these font, e.g. the SVG. So font awesome is a package.

        npm install font-awesome --save

        <i class="fa fa-twitter"></i>

  3. Bootstrap Social Buttons

    Social buttons . They are just a CSS wrapper that is around a social button

    Social buttons are provided by Bootstrap, so you need to include the basic boostrap css and js files in order to use it. In addition, the social button css is not included.

    Download the following file and include it by yourself. Social Buttons CSS

    <a href="http://twitter.com/" target="_blank"><i class="btn btn-social-icon btn-twitter"><i class="fa fa-twitter"></i></i></a>
